mdRecord.dcterms:title: Paynes Creek School 1908 or 1910
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 564_Paynes Creek School Copy Sitting Miss Rena Shortt - teacher. Row 1 (small boys) Luther Peter, Sam Pate, Newburn Kelly, Ray Thompson; Row 2 Theodore Janney, Theodore Kelly, Malcolm Poff, Rice Akers, Murphy Poff, Murphy Thompson, Effie Vest, Jeff Thompson, Mary Kelly (flag), Flor
